definitions.definition: Any woody plant of the Sapindaceae family, found chiefly in tropical climates, most commonly the genus Sapindus .
The fruit of such a plant, especially of the tree Sapindus saponaria .

main_definition: Any woody plant of the Sapindaceae family, found chiefly in tropical climates, most commonly the genus Sapindus .
secondary_definitions: The fruit of such a plant, especially of the tree Sapindus saponaria .
